DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study : - To determine absolute bioavailability SK-1404 - To assess mass balance recovery single oral ( PO ) dose carbon-14 ( 14C ) -SK-1404 - To provide plasma , urine faecal sample metabolite profile structural identification The secondary objective study : - To determine route rate elimination [ 14C ] -SK-1404 - To identify chemical structure metabolite exposure ( AUC ) 10 % circulate total radioactivity - To explore intravenous ( IV ) pharmacokinetics ( PK ) [ 14C ] -SK-1404 - To explore PO PK SK-1404 - To provide additional safety tolerability information SK-1404
DOC.detailed_description: This single-centre , 2-part , open-label , non-randomised , sequential , single dose study healthy male subject . It plan enrol single cohort 6 healthy male subject participate Parts 1 Part 2 study . In Part 1 , subject receive single PO dose SK-1404 follow IV microtracer dose [ 14C ] -SK-1404 . In Part 2 , subject receive single PO dose [ 14C ] -SK-1404 .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male 2 . Age 30 65 year age 3 . Body mass index 18.0 35.0 kg/m2 , outside range , consider clinically significant investigator 4 . Must willing able communicate participate whole study 5 . Must provide write informed consent 6 . Must regular bowel movement ( ie average stool production ≥1 ≤3 stool per day ) 7 . Must agree use adequate method contraception 1 . Males pregnant partner 2 . Participation clinical research study within 3 month prior IMP dose 3 . Subjects study site employee , immediate family member study site sponsor employee 4 . Subjects previously enrol study 5 . Subjects previously dose SK1404 6 . History drug alcohol abuse past 2 year 7 . Regular alcohol consumption male > 21 unit per week ( 1 unit = ½ pint beer , 25 mL 40 % spirit 125 mL glass wine ) past year 8 . Current smoker smoke within last 12 month ; include cigarette , ecigarettes nicotine replacement product . A breath carbon monoxide read great 10 ppm screen admission 9 . Radiation exposure , include present study , exclude background radiation include diagnostic xrays medical exposure , exceed 5 mSv last 12 month 10 mSv last 5 year . No occupationally expose worker , define Ionising Radiation Regulations 1999 , shall participate study 10 . Subjects enrol ADME study last 12 month 11 . Subjects suitable vein multiple venepunctures/cannulation assess investigator screen 12 . Clinically significant abnormal biochemistry , haematology urinalysis judge investigator ( laboratory parameter list Appendix 1 ) 13 . Aspartate aminotransferase , alanine aminotransferase alkaline phosphatase > 1.5 × upper limit normal confirm repeat test 14 . Serum sodium lower limit normal
